events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer role from the candidate and will start the evaluation process shortly.
The application has been categorized under Engineering, specifically for the software development position based on the candidate's resume.
A recruiter specializing in Engineering roles has been assigned to handle this candidate's profile and move forward with the hiring process.
The first screening call was completed with the candidate, discussing the software engineering skills and past project experience in detail.
The candidate responded promptly and positively to the screening feedback, expressing strong enthusiasm about the engineering position.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate with the senior engineering team to evaluate coding and system design capabilities.
